name: Ultra - Neon - Inter - Spatial - Soul - Drifter
name_original: Ultra - Neon - Inter - Spatial - Soul - Drifter
description:
This is a platformer, made for my fundamentals of games design course. It was made in GDevelop.

Note: for the browser version: the space bar has problems, so I'd recommend 'W', and the exit game button does nothing (cause you can't close the game in the browser). It also will obviously run a bit smoother if downloaded.

Also, the music and sound effects are not my own, but were licensed from GameDev Market through the Humble store.
